original_text: So they moved away from the tents of Korah, Dathan and Abiram. Dathan and Abiram had come out and were standing with their wives, children and little ones at the entrances to their tents.
korean_text: 무리가 고라와 다단과 아비람의 장막 사방을 떠나고 다단과 아비람은 그들의 처자와 유아들과 함께 나와서 자기 장막 문에 선지라

sentences.original_text: from the tents of Korah, Dathan and Abiram
Dathan and Abiram had come out
and were standing with their wives, children and little ones
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 아내들과 자녀들과 어린 아이들과 함께 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: at the entrances to their tents
